etomica.modules.clustergenerator

Class Plot

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • etomica.modules.clustergenerator.Plot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClusterPanel

    public abstract class Plot
extends java.awt.Component
    Used from comphys.graphic.plot A class which makes plotting a little more convenient than using Java's Graphics methods.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Computes the x pixel value of a point in the world window.

        Returns:
        the x pixel value of this point on the plot

      • getDimension

        public java.awt.Dimension getDimension(double dx,
                                       double dy)
        Computes the separation in pixels of two points in the world window.
        Parameters:
        dx - the x coordinate difference of the two points in the world
        dy - the y coordinate difference of the two points in the world
        Returns:
        the separation in pixels

      • paint

        public abstract void paint()
        Classes which inherit from Plot must define this method. This method is called when the plot is repainted. All instructions which draw in the plot should be placed in this method.

        Clears the plot.
